atk-abh03a28:2_3: kappaṁ nirayamhi paccatī”ti “sakalampi kappaṁ saṅghabhedako niraye tiṭṭhatī”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a28:2_7: Buddho ca loketi idaṁ vinā buddhuppādena saṅghabhedassa abhāvadassanatthaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a28:2_8: Kappo ca saṇṭhāti saṅgho ca bhijjatītiādi “yadi so sakalaṁ kappaṁ tiṭṭhati,
atk-abh03a28:2_9: saṇṭhahanato paṭṭhāya taṁ kammaṁ katvā tattha uppajjitvā tiṭṭheyyā”ti dassetuṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a28:2_11: Kappaṭṭho iddhimāti pañhe bhāvanāmayaṁ sandhāya paṭikkhipati,
atk-abh03a28:2_14: Chandiddhipādotiādi “jātimayāya iddhiyā iddhimāti laddhimattametaṁ, kiṁ tena,
atk-abh03a28:2_16: iminā nayena iddhipādā bhāvitā bhaveyyu”nti codanatthaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a28:2_17: Āpāyiko nerayikoti suttaṁ yaṁ so ekaṁ kappaṁ asītibhāge katvā tato ekabhāgamattaṁ kālaṁ tiṭṭheyya,
atk-abh03a28:5_4: taṁ mahaggataṁ lokuttaraṁ vā na paṭilabhati.
atk-abh03a28:5_5: Yesaṁ pana imaṁ vibhāgaṁ akatvā aviseseneva “so kusalacittaṁ na paṭilabhatī”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a28:5_7: tesaṁ vibhāgadassanena taṁ laddhiṁ bhindituṁ pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a28:8_2: Tattha anantarāpayutto nāma yena khandhabhedato anantarā vipākadāyakaṁ mātughātādi ānantariyakammaṁ āṇattaṁ.
atk-abh03a28:8_3: Tattha yassa niyatāya āṇattiyā āṇatto taṁ kammaṁ karissati,
atk-abh03a28:8_4: so atthasādhikāya cetanāya uppāditattā micchattaniyato hoti,
atk-abh03a28:8_6: Yassa aniyatāya āṇattiyā āṇatto taṁ kammaṁ karissati,
atk-abh03a28:8_7: so atthasādhikāya cetanāya anuppāditattā na micchattaniyato,
atk-abh03a28:8_8: bhabbo sammattaniyāmaṁ okkamitunti idaṁ sakasamaye sanniṭṭhānaṁ.
atk-abh03a28:8_9: Yesaṁ pana “aniyatāyapi āṇattiyā abhabboyeva sammattaniyāmaṁ okkamitu”nti laddhi,
atk-abh03a28:8_11: tesaṁ taṁ laddhiṁ bhindituṁ sakavādī pubbapakkhaṁ datvā anantarāpayuttoti paravādinā attānaṁ pucchāpeti.
atk-abh03a28:8_14: Tato paravādī mātughātādikammassa āṇattattāva “so micchattaniyato”ti maññati.
atk-abh03a28:8_16: Sakavādī pana ekassa puggalassa dvinnaṁ niyāmānaṁ anokkantimattameva sandhāya na hevanti paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a28:9_2: Aniyatampi hi āṇattiṁ payojetvā ṭhitassa “ananucchavikaṁ mayā kata”nti kukkuccaṁ uppajjateva,
atk-abh03a28:9_4: Hañcītiādi kukkuccuppattimattaṁ gahetvā paravādinā laddhipatiṭṭhāpanatthaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a28:10_1: Idāni yassa aniyatāṇattikassāpi anantarāpayuttassa paravādinā sammattaniyāmokkamanaṁ paṭisiddhaṁ,
atk-abh03a28:10_2: tameva puggalaṁ gahetvā anantarāpayuttopuggalo abhabboti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a28:10_4: Atha naṁ sakavādī “abhabbo nāma mātughātādikammānaṁ kārako,
atk-abh03a28:10_5: kiṁ te tena tāni kammāni katānī”ti codetuṁ mātā jīvitā voropitātiādimāha.
atk-abh03a28:10_6: Itaro tesaṁ vatthūnaṁ arogatāya tathārūpaṁ kiriyaṁ apassanto “na heva”nti paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a28:11_0: Taṁ kammaṁ paṭisaṁharitvāti aniyatāṇattikammaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a28:11_1: Tañhi “mā kho mayā āṇattaṁ ākāsī”ti āṇattaṁ nivārentena paṭisaṁhaṭaṁ nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a28:11_4: Evaṁ santepi panettha purimāṇattiyāyeva niyatabhāvaṁ maññamāno paravādī “āmantā”ti paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a28:11_5: Atha naṁ sakavādī tassa kammassa paṭisaṁhaṭabhāvaṁ sampaṭicchāpetvā attano laddhiṁ patiṭṭhāpetvā hañcītiādimāha.
atk-abh03a28:12_1: Puna anantarāpayuttoti pariyosānapañhe paṭhamapañhe viya pucchā paravādissa,
atk-abh03a28:12_4: paṭisaṁhaṭakālato pubbe payuttakālaṁ sandhāya paṭiññā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a28:12_5: Payuttapubbatāmattaṁ gahetvā aniyatāṇattivasena hañcīti laddhipatiṭṭhāpanaṁ paravādissa.
atk-abh03a28:12_6: Ayaṁ pana laddhi ayoniso patiṭṭhitattā appatiṭṭhitāva hotīti.
atk-abh03a28:15_5: Ime dve niyāme ṭhapetvā añño niyāmo nāma natthi.
atk-abh03a28:15_6: Sabbepi hi sesā tebhūmakadhammā aniyatā nāma.
atk-abh03a28:15_8: Buddhehi pana attano ñāṇabalena “ayaṁ satto anāgate bodhiṁ pāpuṇissatī”ti byākato bodhisatto puññussadattā niyatoti vuccati.
atk-abh03a28:15_9: Iti imaṁ vohāramattaṁ gahetvā “pacchimabhaviko bodhisatto tāya jātiyā bhabbo dhammaṁ abhisametu”nti adhippāyena
atk-abh03a28:15_14: Micchattaniyatotiādi aññena niyāmena niyatassa aññaniyāmābhāvadassanatthaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a28:15_17: Bhabbo bodhisattoti vacanaṁ kevalaṁ bodhisattassa bhabbataṁ dīpeti,
atk-abh03a28:15_20: So hi pubbe ekenapi niyatadhammena aniyato bodhimūle saccadassanena niyāmaṁ okkantoti.
atk-abh03a28:18_2: Tattha suddhassa suddhakiccābhāvato nīvaraṇehi nivuto ophuṭo pariyonaddho ca nīvaraṇaṁ jahatīti yesaṁ laddhi,
atk-abh03a28:18_6: Ratto rāgantiādi nivutassa nīvaraṇajahane dosadassanatthaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a28:18_7: Parisuddhe pariyodātetiādi vikkhambhanavisuddhiyā visuddhassa samucchedavisuddhidassanatthaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a28:18_8: Tassa evaṁ jānatotiādi jānato passato āsavakkhayaṁ dīpeti,
atk-abh03a28:21_2: Tattha sammukhībhūtoti saṁyojanānaṁ sammukhībhāvaṁ tehi samaṅgībhāvaṁ upagato.
atk-abh03a28:24_4: sā cassa jhānanikanti jhānārammaṇā hotī”ti yesaṁ laddhi,
atk-abh03a28:24_8: Taṁ jhānaṁ tassa jhānassa ārammaṇanti pañhesu tasseva tadārammaṇataṁ apassanto suttavirodhabhayena paṭikkhipati,
atk-abh03a28:24_10: So tadassādetīti suttaṁ jhānalābhino jhānā vuṭṭhāya jhānassādaṁ sādheti,
atk-abh03a28:27_2: Tattha “yaṁkiñci vedanaṁ vedeti sukhaṁ vā dukkhaṁ vā adukkhamasukhaṁ vā,
atk-abh03a28:27_3: so taṁ vedanaṁ abhinandati abhivadatī”ti sutte diṭṭhābhinandanavasena vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a28:27_7: te sandhāya atthi asātarāgoti pucchā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a28:27_8: Tattha asātarāgoti asāte dukkhavedayite “aho vata me etadeva bhaveyyā”ti rajjanā.
atk-abh03a28:28_0: 675.So taṁ vedanaṁ abhinandatīti sutte pana vinivaṭṭetvā dukkhavedanameva ārabbha rāguppatti nāma natthi,
atk-abh03a28:28_1: samūhaggahaṇena pana vedayitalakkhaṇaṁ dhammaṁ dukkhavedanameva vā attato samanupassanto diṭṭhimaññanāsaṅkhātāya
atk-abh03a28:28_4: dukkhāya vedanāya abhibhūto tassā paṭipakkhaṁ kāmasukhaṁ patthayantopi dukkhavedanaṁ abhinandati nāma.
atk-abh03a28:31_3: dhammataṇhāti imāsu chasu taṇhāsu yasmā sabbapacchimā taṇhā dhammataṇhāti vuttā,
atk-abh03a28:31_9: Kāmataṇhātiādīhi tīhi koṭṭhāsehi chapi taṇhā saṅkhipitvā dassitā.
atk-abh03a28:31_10: Rūpādīsu hi chasu ārammaṇesu kāmassādavasena pavattā taṇhā kāmataṇhā.
atk-abh03a28:31_11: “Bhavissati attā ca loko cā”ti sassatadiṭṭhisahagatā taṇhā bhavataṇhā.
atk-abh03a28:31_13: Nanu sā dhammataṇhāti padaṁ taṇhāya dhammārammaṇaṁ ārabbha pavattiṁ dīpeti,
